pullCommandDescription: Retrieves specific metadata/s to a sepcified location
pushCommandDescription: Deploys specific metadata or a group of metadata from a sepcified location
nameFlagDescription: Name of the component/s to retrieve
typeFlagDescription: Type of the components to retrieve, only support one component at a time
targetdirFlagDescription: Path of target directory where the component needs to be pulled
includedirFlagDescription: If you want to retrieve the directory as well along with the metadata components
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
